name.title: Name
name.description: Name to appear in the Home app

http_method.title: HTTP Method
http_method.description: The HTTP method to be used to communicate with the device API.

openURL.title: Open URL
openURL.description: URL to trigger the opening of your garage

closeURL.title: Close URL
closeURL.description: URL to trigger the closing of your garage

username.title: Username
username.description: Username if HTTP authentication is enabled

password.title: Password
password.description: Password if HTTP authentication is enabled

webhookPort.title: Webhook Port
webhookPort.description: Port for local webhook server listening on /garage/update

openTime.title: Time to open the door
openTime.description: Time (in seconds) to simulate your garage opening

closeTime.title: Time to close the door
closeTime.description: Time (in seconds) to simulate your garage closing

autoClose.title: Auto close
autoClose.description: Whether your garage should auto-close after being opened

autoCloseDelay.title: Auto close delay
autoCloseDelay.description: Time (in seconds) until your garage will automatically close (if enabled)

polling.title: Poll state
polling.description: Whether the state should be polled at intervals (requires magnetic sensor).

pollInterval.title: Polling interval
pollInterval.description: Time (in seconds) between device polls (if `polling` is enabled)

statusURL.title: Status polling URL
statusURL.description: URL to retrieve state on poll (if `statusField*` options are not set, expects HTTP response body to be `0` or `1`)

statusKey.title: Status Key
statusKey.description: JSONPath that identifies the property that contains the status of the door (e.g. `$.inputs[0].input` is the default for Shelly 1) | `$.inputs[0].input`

statusValueOpen.title: Open status value
statusValueOpen.description: Regex that will match the `open` state of the relay status (e.g. `open`)

statusValueClosed.title: Closed status value
statusValueClosed.description: Regex that will match the `closed` state of the relay status (e.g. `closed`)

statusValueOpening.title: Opening status value
statusValueOpening.description: Regex that will match the `opening` state of the relay status (e.g. `opening`)

statusValueClosing.title: Closing status value
statusValueClosing.description: Regex that will match the `closing` state of the relay status (e.g. `closing`)

manufacturer.title: Manufactor
manufacturer.description: Appears under the Manufacturer field for the accessory

model.title: Model
model.description: Appears under the Model field for the accessory

debug.title: Debug mode
debug.description: Turn on debug mode, i.e. additional information will show up on the homebridge log.
